SEARCH

Package com.riskgame.model

package com.riskgame.model
  • Class
    Description
    Advance
    Class containing logic for implementation of advance order
    AggressiveStrategy
    This class is used to implement Aggressive strategy.
    Airlift
    Class containing logic for implementation of airlift order
    BenevolentStrategy
    This class is used to implement Benevolent strategy.
    Blockade
    Class containing logic for implementation of Blockade order
    Bomb
    Class containing logic for implementation of Bomb order
    Card
    This card class will handle all requests related to cards.
    CheaterStrategy
    CheaterStrategy is a strategy class which is used to implement cheater strategy.
    ConquestMap
    ConquestMap class is the adapter class for reading and saving domination map
    Continent
    Contains details about continents like control value, color, countries, continent id.
    Country
    Contains all details about country like name, belonging continent, neighbors, and number of armies deployed on them
    Deploy
    Class containing logic for implementation of Deploy order
    Diplomacy
    Class containing logic for implementation of Diplomacy order
    DominationMap
    DominationMap class is the adapter class for reading and saving domination map
    GameData
    Class holds the data required to maintain the state of the game.
    GameMap
    Contains details of the map like continents, countries etc during the game.
    GameState
    Represents the state of the game.
    IssueOrderPhase
    Implementation of the Issue Order Phase for gameplay using the State Pattern.
    LogEntryBuffer
    Records logs for different stages of the game.
    MapAdapter
    Adapter class for reading and saving map
    MapHelper
    This class contains helper functions related to Map.
    Observable
    Class to assist attaching, detaching, and notifying observers.
    Order
    Executes the player order Command class in command design pattern
    OrderExecutionPhase
    Represents the order execution phase.
    Phase
    This abstract class enforces the method requirements for each game phase.
    Player
    Represents a player in the game.
    PlayerStrategy
    This class is used to implement the strategy pattern for each player behavior.
    RandomStrategy
    RandomStrategy class is used to implement Random Strategy
    StartUpPhase
    Implementation of the Start-Up Phase for gameplay using the State Pattern.
